code: var selectCoins=function selectCoins(coins,_ref){var text=_ref.text,sortBy=_ref.sortBy;return coins.filter(function(coin){var textMatch=coin.symbol.toLowerCase().includes(text.toLowerCase())||coin.name.toLowerCase().includes(text.toLowerCase());return textMatch;}).sort(function(a,b){if(sortBy==='order'){return parseInt(a.sortOrder)>parseInt(b.sortOrder)?1:-1;}else if(sortBy==='nameAsc'){return a.name>b.name?1:-1;}else if(sortBy==='nameDesc'){return b.name>a.name?1:-1;}else if(sortBy==='mktcapAsc'){return a.mktCap-b.mktCap;}else if(sortBy==='mktcapDesc'){return b.mktCap-a.mktCap;}else if(sortBy==='priceAsc'){return a.price-b.price;}else if(sortBy==='priceDesc'){return b.price-a.price;}else if(sortBy==='changeAsc'){return a.changePctDay-b.changePctDay;}else if(sortBy==='changeDesc'){return b.changePctDay-a.changePctDay;}});};export default selectCoins;
